com.google.api.gax.grpc

Class OperationFuture<ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<V>
      • com.google.api.gax.grpc.OperationFuture<ResponseT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RpcFuture<ResponseT>, com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<ResponseT>, Future<ResponseT>

    public final class OperationFuture<ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<V>
    A RpcFuture which polls a service through OperationsApi for the completion of an operation.

    • Method Summary

      Creates an OperationFuture with a custom polling interval.
      ResponseT get()
      Waits on the polling loop on Operations.GetOperation, and once Operation.done is true, then returns Operation.response if successful or throws ExecutionException containing an ApiException with the status code set to Operation.error if not successful.
      ResponseT get(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Waits on the polling loop on Operations.GetOperation, and once Operation.done is true, then returns Operation.response if successful or throws ExecutionException containing an ApiException with the status code set to Operation.error if not successful.
      com.google.longrunning.Operation getFirstOperationData()
      Returns the Operation object returned from the call to start the Operation.
      com.google.protobuf.Any getMetadata()
      Returns the value of Operation.metadata from the initial Operation object returned from the initial call to start the Operation.
      String getOperationName()
      Returns the value of Operation.name from the initial Operation object returned from the initial call to start the Operation.
      boolean isCancelled()
      Returns true if the operation has been cancelled.
      boolean isDone()
      Issues Operations.GetOperation and returns value of Operation.done.

      • cancel

        public final boolean cancel(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
        If last Operation's value of `done` is true, returns false; otherwise, issues Operations.CancelOperation and returns true.
        Specified by:

      • get

        public final ResponseT get()
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           ExecutionException
        Waits on the polling loop on Operations.GetOperation, and once Operation.done is true, then returns Operation.response if successful or throws ExecutionException containing an ApiException with the status code set to Operation.error if not successful.

      • addListener

        public final void addListener(Runnable listener,
                              Executor executor)
        Enters a polling loop on Operations.GetOperation, and once Operation.done is true, notifies the listener. Normally, Futures.addCallback would be used instead of calling this directly.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface RpcFuture<ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
        Overrides:
        addListener in class com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

      • getOperationName

        public final String getOperationName()
                              throws InterruptedException,
                                     ExecutionException
        Returns the value of Operation.name from the initial Operation object returned from the initial call to start the Operation. Blocks if the initial call to start the Operation hasn't returned yet.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
